title: Saudi Arabia expects 2024 deficit to widen to 3% of GDP
description:
(Recasts lead and headline, adds details, background throughout)

By Pesha Magid, Hatem Maher and Jaidaa Taha

RIYADH, Sept 30 (Reuters) - Saudi Arabia estimates its 2024 fiscal deficit will widen to almost 3% of GDP, according to a government statement on Monday, as it increases spending to boost g...
